# <a name="search-mail-and-people-on-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="e0695-102">Išči pošto in ljudi na Outlook na spletu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e0695-102">Search Mail and People on Outlook on the Web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e0695-103">V na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e0695-103">In the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABUAAAAVBAMAAABbObilAAAAKlBMVEX///+WqL7l6u8vUn8iR3azwNDCzNlObJFAYIkDLWNeeZuks8d7ka1thaRtSbf+AAAAS0lEQVQI12MgFjAdmVkKY6csYxK5AGUbAqWsIUzGBiARAmGzCwAJlgQwmyMARiDEEeoxzWEyQZivLAS3l8kQ4RplkDF4hRkWEvQSABbdDSdqA/J0AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC' />
 <span data-ttu-id="e0695-104">Polje za **Iskanje** na vrhu strani, vnesete kar želite za iskanje (stik, zadevo e-pošte, ali del sporočila) in pritisnite Enter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e0695-104">**Search** box at the top of the page, type what you want to search for (a contact, email subject, or part of a message) and press Enter.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="e0695-105">Ko končate z iskanje, izberite nazaj puščico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e0695-105">When you're done with the search, select the back arrow</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e0695-106">v **Iskanje** rubrika ali izberite katero koli mapo v levem podoknu, če želite zapreti iskanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e0695-106">in the **Search** box or select any folder in the left pane to exit the search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e0695-107">Za več informacij, preberite [Išči pošto in ljudi v Outlooku na spletu](https://support.office.com/article/b27e5eb7-3255-4c61-bf16-1c6a16bc2e6b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e0695-107">For more information, read [Search Mail and People in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/b27e5eb7-3255-4c61-bf16-1c6a16bc2e6b).</span></span>
